translations: 解雇；洗劫；（美式橄榄球）擒抱（四分卫）；把……装入袋里（sack 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Rome was sacked by the Goths in 410.
sentences.translation: 罗马在410年遭到哥特人的洗劫。

sentences.sentence: If he hadn't been so good at the rest of his job, I probably would have sacked him.
sentences.translation: 如果他不是在工作的其他方面做得这么好，我可能已经把他解雇了。
